https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/8EtiyCToATBlBHiAchkQ3ReEBJf.jpg Fang Zhen Dong is a patrolling officer in Beijing who one night meets the drunk Li Pei Ru while singing karaoke at the KTV place. Li Pei Ru is a real estate agent from Hong Kong who has vowed to make her fortune in the cosmoplitan Beijing, but is caught up in the complexities of life and ends up becoming a mistress of a married man. A Beautiful Life
